Producer: San Fu Maltha, Jens Meurer, Teun Hilte, Jos van der Linden
Production Co: CoBo Fund, Motion Investment Group, Medienboard Berlin-Brandenburg, Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique, Studio Babelsberg, MEDIA Programme of the European Union, Egoli Tossell Film, VIP 4 Medienfonds, Umedia, uFilm
Synopsis: After narrowly escaping death, young Rachel Rosenthal (Carice van Houten) becomes part of the Jewish resistance, assuming the name Ellis de Vries. Her superiors order her to seduce a Gestapo officer named Ludwig (Sebastian Koch). Ellis is successful in her mission but soon finds herself falling in love with her mortal enemy.
Title: Black Book
